titles.title: REPAIR Resolution
Responsible Environmental Preservation and American Infrastructure Restoration Resolution

Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to exclude certain provisions relating to water resources development projects of the Corps of Engineers or the Bureau of Reclamation from the definition of congressional earmark, and for other purposes.
REPAIR Resolution

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Responsible Environmental Preservation and American Infrastructure Restoration Resolution or the REPAIR Resolution
Amends Rule XXI (Restrictions on Certain Bills) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to exclude from the definition of "congressional earmark" a provision or report language that provides, authorizes, or recommends an amount of discretionary budget authority for a project of the Corps of Engineers or the Bureau of Reclamation.
